post.author: zeh
post.body: The new version has been released, featuring a bunch of cool new features for mod makers, such as baking texturemaps, the retopo tool ratty redemption mentioned previously, a multi-resolution mesh editor, sculpt modeling, and a lot more. See a list of the features here.

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body: cool, except the links to the Blender Documentation Project on their new site appear to link back to their home page
